item.title: CVE-2024-1688|2024-05-02T16:52:10.808Z -- shivashankerbhatta -- Woo Total Sales
item.description: The Woo Total Sales plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the get_orders_archive() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.4. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to retrieve sales reports for the store.
